verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] presiding over a failed immigration policy with lots of racism and little concrete success .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: presiding] [ARG1: over a failed immigration policy] [ARGM-MNR: with lots of racism and little concrete success] .
